turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey assistant, can you order me a coffee from Starbucks to go pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will. Which location did you want to pick it up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it to be the Starbucks on pavilion parkway in Newport Kentucky.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one on the levee in Barnes and noble?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of coffee did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a cinnamon dolce latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How big did you want it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the grande size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I prefer soy milk if you can.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That'd be fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also don't want whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll ask them to hold back on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: This will just go on your account. Is that all right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah that would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome. I put in the order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long do I wait for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be ready shortly and a receipt will be sent to your phone in a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Have a good day.
